thread.title: INSIDE STORY: Mahesh Babu's Planning Shaking Star Heroes
thread.title_full: INSIDE STORY: Mahesh Babu's Planning Shaking Star Heroes

title: INSIDE STORY: Mahesh Babu's Planning Shaking Star Heroes
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Updated: Tuesday, October 20, 2015, 11:39 [IST] 
Mahesh Babu is a changed man now and that is what is making him emerge as the powerful among his contenders. Like all the star heroes now we have in Tollywood, Mahesh Babu also use to take atleast a year gap between his movies and was always in look out for fresh scripts, once. 
But he is not giving much of his time for movie selection of late and still has great line up films. Thanks to his wife Namrata, who is lessening him the burden of story sittings and script narrations. 
Mahesh Babu, who delivered a blockbuster with Srimanthudu a couple of months back, is currently shooting for Srikanth Addala's Brahmotsavam . He is likely to complete the film by January and release it in the pongal race. 
On the other hand, a couple of interesting projects are lined up for the actor, blocking him for the next whole year. After Brahmotsvam , Mahesh will be moving to Puri Jagannadh's Enemy and might simultaneously kick start a film with A R Murugadoss. 
Soon after that he is expected to work with S S Rajamouli. This planning of Mahesh, who is not taking a break from work, is surely sending chills down the spines of other heroes. 
Apparently, they are wondering how Mahesh is able to get all the good scripts and hit directors at once while they are struggling to catch hold of one striking script. 
Well! Only Mahesh and Namrata has to reveal their secret. Meanwhile, let us know which upcoming project of Mahesh excites you more by leaving your comments in the comment box below. INSIDE STORY: Mahesh Babu's Planning Shaking Star Heroes 1/5 Paris 
Mahesh Babu is now Paris for a holiday with family, as he got a week time between the shooting schedules of Brahmotsavam. Though he is a busy man, he never misses out on spending time with his kids. INSIDE STORY: Mahesh Babu's Planning Shaking Star Heroes 2/5 Three Heroines 
Mahesh's Brahmotsvam features Samantha, Kajal and Pranitha in the lead and its ensemble cast makes it a more interesting project. INSIDE STORY: Mahesh Babu's Planning Shaking Star Heroes 3/5 Shruti Haasan 
According to the latest update, Shruti Haasan will again be romancing Mahesh in Murugadoss' project, after delivering a hit with Srimanthudu. INSIDE STORY: Mahesh Babu's Planning Shaking Star Heroes 4/5 Puri 
Puri-Mahesh film is tentatively titled as Enemy and the project has a lot of buzz since the duo delivered remarkable films like Pokiri and Business Man, earlier. You might like
